name: Singles' Generation
description: Singles' Generation is a visual novel story, which follows the life of a group of young friends, including their successes and failures in finding happiness and love, and finding their place in today’s fast-paced, modern world.

name: A Perfect Day for White Dolphin
description: 改編自乾綠郎的小說《完美的蛇頸龍之日》。 在這個時代，人們可以透過SC裝置和植物人進行感應。 感應淺者知道自己正在虛擬世界之中；感應深者，則會分不清虛幻與現實。 即使如此，黃芷欣還是決定和植物人弟弟芷樂進行感應，她必須找出芷樂自殺的原因。

name: A Random Maze
description: 一个忘记自己姓名与过去的人，在突然出现的神秘人物的帮助下，从一个空无一人的医院开始探索自己的过去。只有取回真实，才能从这里离开，即使……真相不像你所期待的那样，他也依然盼望着他的未来。

name: Shooty 2D
description: Shooty 2D is a gun battle game. You can set up a room and fight with your friends.

name: Balance Ball
description: In the game you have to balance the ball on the platform, so as not to fall into the abyss. Good luck in the exciting world of Balance Ball.

name: InvaderSwarm
description: InvaderSwarm is an old-school hardcore game. You are the pilot of a galactic ship and it's time to destroy hundreds of aliens!

name: Ultimate Demolition
description: This is a challenging leisure puzzle game. Players need to make all the balls reach the target point in a limited time, so as to stop the countdown of the time bomb.

name: The song of Star night
description: 轻度战斗的日式RPG，扮演主人公洛米尔演绎达摩克里斯传说里，充满魔幻史诗色彩的爱恨情仇的故事。

name: Maze Party
description: Well, This is a maze game. Uhh... a game to play with your friends as a party: Exploring the mysterious maze, Racing to be the top or fight against each other. Maze party is an online 2-8 players with various interesting game modes in a theme of "MAZE".

name: Dear Althea
description: Decide Althea's fate in dark Victorian London. Experience the story of an upper-class young woman whose family is falling apart along with her future and who is filled with diverse and interesting characters among whom she may find love.

name: Spaceslingers
description: Spaceslingers is a mind-bending gravity-based game, where the only obstacles between you and your goal are the most powerful celestial objects in the known universe!

name: Arabian Treasures: Midnight Match
description: This is the rags to riches story told in a match 3 puzzle adventure within an Arabian themed game!

name: Hagia Sophia VR Experience
description: Hagia Sophia literally Holy Mosque of Hagia Sophia the Grand, and formerly the Church of Hagia Sophia, is a Late Antique place of worship in Istanbul, designed by the Greek geometers Isidore of Miletus and Anthemius of Tralles.

name: Autumn-Chess
description: The single player self-propelled chess game template and experimental works made by myself contain the basic elements of self-propelled chess game. However, due to the lack of funds, the monster setting and ending screen were not done.

name: Terminal
description: Relax and lose yourself in a beautifully crafted puzzle experience. Solve over 100 hand-made puzzles and uncover the mysteries of love, perseverance, and motivation.

name: Onnanoko Keeper 2
description: This game is a real-time action game with a retro atmosphere. Enjoy the various stages of difficulty and the CG of "Onnanoko".

name: Silver Cats
description: In the afterlife world, a fierce struggle began between demons for the right to own the throne. Due to the feuds of the demons, a rift opened into the afterlife world, which turned the country Rain into ruins. Now the guild "Silver Cats" is trying to return the destroyed world to its previous state.

name: Noah's Ark
description: Welcome to Noah's Ark, a realistic simulator game inspired by stories from Genesis of the Bible. Now it is time for you to be like Noah and build famous vessel, save (hunt) animals and survive during the biggest flood ever. Are you ready for this challenge?

name: Kari
description: Explore mysterious lands after a magical storm strands you on the shore of Vanaheim. Seek out help from the gods inspired by Norse Mythology in a Singleplayer Combat-Free Adventure-Puzzle Game. A game about helping each other, Kari is developed by students from BUas.

name: Escape Zombies At Night
description: This is a doomsday survival escape game.

name: Tower of Doom
description: Tower of Doom is a VR arcade shooter in which the player has to survive multiple waves of enemies in different levels. Each round the player gets to choose one out of four auto-generated guns in order to move up the highscoreboard and make it to the next stage.

name: Magic Pot&ter Battlegrounds
description: Fight in pvp, go through a maze with traps.

name: The Door
description: 你想要明白生命的真正意义吗，想在无尽的世界里游戏吗，想真正的活着吗？ 那么主神空间欢迎您！

name: Naught
description:
Naught is a platform videogame with a unique control where you rotate the environment to change gravity and guide the main character, Naught, through labyrinth levels full of challenges, hidden places and secrets.

Featuring varied, dynamic gameplay, Naught explores 70 levels where he must dodge danger and enemies arising from the shadows, discover hidden places, collect seeds of light that will help him access blocked areas, and recover the diamond fragments that possess enormous power.

Throughout his adventure, he will be accompanied by the Spirit of the Tree, who will help him find his way through extremely narrow and complex labyrinths. You can also enjoy a time trial challenge on every level.

In Naught, you will discover an underground world full of lights and shadows, connected to the exciting story of our character: a soul awakened to face the shadows and protect what he loves the most.

name: Survive Isolation
description: Trapped in Island. Collect stuff and try to survive and be careful against pirate enemies and other dangerous obstacles

name: Structura
description: Structura is a rather unique sci-fi real-time strategy set in space. Its a hybrid of rts and fps, with emphasis on combat and survival. Build your economy for war, modify the unit by adding components, explore, expand, and survive the savage waves of enemy attacks.

name: Taisho x Alice: Episode 3
description: Taisho x Alice: Episode 3 is a fairytale visual novel in which YOU must save your Prince Charming! You will take on the role of the fairytale heroine in order to rehabilitate your chosen love interest and guide him to his "happily ever after"!

name: STAY
description: Welcome to STAY, a Special Test of Attention Yield. Will you survive long enough?

name: Payday 2: The Big Bank Heist
description: If money is the lifeblood of this city, then the Benevolent bank is its beating heart.The Big Bank DLC is the eighth DLC pack for Payday 2 and adds the new contact the Dentist, the biggest heist yet called the Big Bank as well as the new Preplanning feature.

name: Nocturne
description: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

name: Wars across the World: Bulge 1944
description: Bulge 1944 is the story of the last German offensive in the West to check the Allied advance. The Germans must reach the Meuse river and take Bastogne. The Allied forces must first contain and then repulse the enemy in the midst of bad winter conditions.

name: Payday 2 VR
description: Step into the world of a heister! PAYDAY 2 VR is the full Payday 2 experience, where you really get a sense of every cop, dozer, cloaker and medic closing in on you.

name: Two Point Campus
description: Build the university of your dreams with Two Point Campus, the follow up management sim with a twist from the creators of Two Point Hospital. Get to know your students, explore their personalities and fulfill their wants and needs. Craft buildings, choose courses, hire the best staff and build an academic institution to stand the test of time.

name: Life with Mary
description: In LIFE WITH MARY, you take control of our MC who’s lived a pretty stale life, albeit successful with his career. But your mundane existence is changed when your longtime friend unexpectedly drops his daughter off to live with you, so she can attend a music school in the city.

name: Overland Weekend
description: It's the weekend and you have your off-road vehicle ready for weekend of adventure. Time to hit the trails and find a nice remote place to setup camp.

name: Ri Ri Ye Ye
description: Sin descripción

name: Remedy
description: Remedy is a first person puzzle adventure game where the player awakens in a world of darkness. Solve puzzles to unlock new abilities, areas of the map and guide the orb back to paradise. Use the power of dissolve to transform the plagued world of darkness back to beauty.

name: Flea!
description: Flea is a challenging platformer with an intriguing back story. Play as Henry the Hyperactive Flea who just can’t stop jumping! Navigate the beast and collect blood to get the the heart of the problems.

name: Welcome to the Polyverse
description: Robert Kane, convinced he is living in a simulation, will do anything he has to in order to get out. He must stop at nothing to unlock the secrets of this world and accomplish his goal.

name: Quarantine Cutz
description: A hilarious cartoon simulation where you're absolutely terrible at cutting hair. Can you overcome your nerves and total pop culture ignorance to give your family a haircut that won't crush their dreams? Probably not, but you're gonna give it your best shot!

name: Roll a Ball With Your Friends
description: If you have a friends. Let's roll a ball with your friends!!! Exciting Multi Play Roll a Ball Game. I will have over 10 stages. Compare speed of time with friend!

name: Rumpus
description: Rumpus is a live-coding playground for room-scale VR.

name: Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures
description:
Be the hero of your own Star Wars adventures in a galaxy far, far away. Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures includes Star Wars Galaxies and all of the game’s expansions, including An Empire Divided, Jump to Lightspeed, Rage of the Wookiees, and Trials of Obi-Wan, along with all of the regularly updated “Chapter” adventures that are downloaded regularly to your PC.

The Complete Online Adventures is the most inclusive and immersive Star Wars Galaxies experience ever introduced. Includes hundreds of hours of game play. Players of all levels can jump into exciting adventures 24/7 and travel to legendary Star Wars locations with iconic characters. Along the way, players can join with others on missions that take them across the galaxy fighting with the Galactic Empire or the Rebel Faction. Getting started is easy – The Complete Online Adventures is all you need.

name: Dead Covid-19 in space
description: Covid-19 is decreasing the population of the planet earth every day. You are the most seasoned fighter who is ready to sacrifice himself to save the world. You will find out what the secret of the virus is, and find a way to heal it

name: Escapeworld Dilemma
description: Kidnapped from your everyday life, you find yourself in a large theme park that feels more like an escape room. Solve puzzles, explore 12 themed islands, find resources, and use your wits to escape while resolving your dilemma ...

name: Far Away Train
description: Far Away Train is a first person view story-driven puzzle adventure game. Player wakes up in an unfamiliar old-fashioned train running in vast and beautiful plain, and is told to follow in the footsteps of the ephemeral life of the abandoned Empress Roxelana.

name: Zombie Raid
description: Zombie Raid is a top-down shooter with frenetic action where your objective is to survive waves of enemies. Use wisely the many different weapons available as well as your grenades to get rid off those hordes of deadly zombies. The game has an very long play life thanks to its procedural on the fly levels generator making them infinite.

name: Samochodowy Wojownik
description:
Samochodowy Wojownik is an arcade racing game with shooter elements. You are the driver of the police combat car - Ferrari 1200 DRX, struggling with a gang of smugglers in the suburbs. During the patrol, you will encounter the vehicles of the criminals and the criminals themselves who will try to eliminate the threat.

The game is currently "Lost Media".

name: Hentai Swimming Club
description: Play with one hand and conquer the maidens.

name: Mind Muscle VR
description: Improve your fitness level and mind-muscle connection using virtual reality and the power of visualization.

name: Vain Riser
description: "Vain Riser" is an AVG developed by Team Strrationalism. In the game, girls gather in the Victorian coastal town "Gloden Sand Town" to realize their dream of flying into the blue sky step by step.

name: Car Looper
description: You are the manager of a race track. You build racetracks by placing different street tiles. Can you build a looping racetrack in time? Try your puzzle solving skills in this fun and challenging game!

name: Geometry Rocket
description: Race against time, defeat the enemy and collect energy. In geometry rocket you need to be fast and accurate if you want to be the best in a battle against yourself.

name: One Day More
description: An exciting skateboarding adventure awaits you in the fantasy world of a girl named Hannah! One Day More is a game about gaining self-confidence and coping with inner problems.

name: Movie Tycoon Simulator 2020
description: Manage movie theatres and make your very own Hollywood Pictures!

name: Horror Movie Bingo
description: Prepare to take your scary movie night to the next level of fun with Horror Movie Bingo. See if you can spot enough horror film tropes to get 5-in-a-row!

name: The Killer of Dishonor
description: The Killer of Dishonor - is a hardcore 2D platformer with surviving elements where you will have to fight to ancient evil playing as a hired killer.

name: Neko Papala
description: An energetic college boy and 4 abandoned lovely cats use their love songs to make these 4 cats become sexy kitty maids.

name: The Marvellous Machine
description: The Marvellous Machine is a fifteen minute narrated journey in VR that lets you explore the inner workings of your mind and experience new perspectives.

name: Homeland: Lay to Rest
description: Homeland: Lay to Rest is a third person action-adventure game about a monk in training who fights corrupted guardians with a thrown homing weapon to redeem their overrun childhood home.

name: Dear Home
description: Dear Home is an adventure game with puzzles and exploration on an unknown planet.

name: Pandemos
description: Pandemos: Embark on this dangerous and fun pixelated dystopia, where the Protectors defend the harmless Cells from a massive invasion of dangerous virus agents of unknown origin.

name: Heroes of Eldemor
description: A multiplayer medieval sandbox open world game with original music by real people.

name: Desdemona
description: Gather your courage and face the ghost danger.Clean the curses and hunt the ghost!

name: Across the demon realm
description: Inspirated by the Oregon trail, Across the demon realm is a brutal and gory adventure with random events.

name: Borderus: Angels & Demons
description: Enjoy the classic, "Xonix" style arcade gameplay with sexy girls gone wild! This new series of Borderus features a new theme with the hottest angels and demons you'll ever see.

name: Defensive Attacks
description: Place your defenses and protect your base against incoming enemies.

name: Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Pokémon Shining Pearl Double Pack
description: A double pack containing the Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Pokémon Shining Pearl games will be available for purchase as a packaged version or as a digital downloadable version. The packaged version includes 1 physical Pokémon Brilliant Diamond game and 1 physical Pokémon Shining Pearl game while the downloadable version includes digital versions of both the Pokémon Brilliant Diamond game and the Pokémon Shining Pearl game. Revisit the Sinnoh region and the story of the Pokémon Diamond Version and the Pokémon Pearl Version games Experience the nostalgic story from the Pokémon Diamond Version and the Pokémon Pearl Version games in a reimagined adventure, Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Pokémon Shining Pearl, now on the Nintendo Switch system! Adventures in the Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Pokémon Shining Pearl games will take place in the familiar Sinnoh region. Rich in nature and with mighty Mount Coronet at its heart, Sinnoh is a land of many myths passed down through the ages. You’ll choose either Turtwig, Chimchar, or Piplup to be your first partner Pokémon and then set off on your journey to become the Champion of the Pokémon League. Along the way, you’ll be able to encounter the Legendary Pokémon Dialga (in Pokémon Brilliant Diamond) or Palkia (in Pokémon Shining Pearl).

name: Akemi-tan
description: My name is Shimoda Shimoko, currently living in a small village protected by the God named The Ou. Villagers are here required to bring offerings to the God every day in exchange for the God's protection. It's heard that if anyone broke this rule or ate the offering, the village would be attacked by the evil spirits and devastated in the end. But no one has ever done that so no one knows if that is real. I guess that is just a very old rumour, old enough to be forgotten by the God himself maybe. Oops, did I mention that today it's my family's turn to provide offerings? I'd better go now...

name: Body Elements
description:
"My friend,
I won't let you die.
Never."

This game is a fairy tale of 4 prisoners.

name: Oyadori no Ko
description: It’s widely known among Devil followers. Once upon a time, there was a girl possessed by the Demon. Although the Demon was expelled from her body after that, its words left. "There have to be 9 people offering to the Devil every year on the full moon night. If anyone survives 3 days after being offered to the Devil, the Devil will be back to this world. The Devil will grant this world happiness and freedom.

name: Chasing Demons
description: Chasing Demons is an open-world, choices-matters RPG designed by Randumb Studios, based off of ALL of the previous titles and question-based games combined.

name: Afterlife: The Second Dimension
description:
A schoolgirl named Yuna finds herself alone in her classroom, without knowing what happened before. After a while, she meets his best friend Kazuki and will discover that creatures appeared from nowhere and tried to kill them. Together, they'll have to figure out what's going on and pass through this nightmare.

What is happening in this town?

name: Chikoku no Mokushiroku
description: Chikoku no Mokushiroku is a single player adventure RPG about a man who's locked in his house and can't get out.

name: Matryona no Yuube
description: Matryona is a pretty, adorable girl. That’s what her mother tells her, what her father tells her. She is the ideal daughter that anyone could wish for… But is the reality of the situation truly as sweet as it seems? As they say, everyone has their secrets…

name: Ichiro Shounen Kitan
description: Ichiro is a boy interested in the paranormal. One day while he was playing kokkuri-san, he annoys the seven mysteries of his school. These spirits prevent Ichiro and his friend from leaving the school, so he must face each of them to get out.

name: Girls' Last Tour: Book Burning Simulator
description: Get Yuuri to burn as many books as possible without the sleepy Chito noticing!

name: Nightmare of the Snow
description: On a very snowy and dark morning, Yuuki Shinozaki, a shy middle schooler, was preparing for her trip to a farewell party of her school...but an unfortunate tragedy happened. When Yuuki was helping her friend, Taiga, to look for his lost handphone, she was taken mysteriously to a lost, dark dimension where a big, mysterious mansion existed. Yuuki didn't know...that this is all just the beginning of her NIGHTMAREs in THE SNOWy and freezing night...

name: Table Tennis
description:
Play this classic table tennis game against your friends, family or the the smart the Ai player anytime.

Matches are randomly hosted in 8 different locations around a school.

Beat the toughest opponent with the perfect angle shot by slicing the ball and moving in the other direction as fast as you can.

The Ai player has 3 levels of skill, from easy to hard, however the real challenge may be against your human opponents, either way winning won't come easy.

name: Kyouren no Utage
description:
A boy wakes up in the dark, cold cell after seeing the death of his family.
What is this place, why is he here?
While he tries to find the way out of this place, he experiences pieces of memories, flashbacks to solve the mystery of his abduction as well as someone else past...

Take the role of a boy, Takuma, and explore this eerie place, find missing pieces of memories to solve and escape while running away from insane creatures that lurks about the place...

name: Above Snakes
description: Piece by piece, create your own world and survive in this Wild West-inspired survival RPG. Craft, farm, hunt, build your base, and fight in order to stay alive.

name: Star Point Explorer
description:
A minimalist space arcade game.

You ride a planet to discover new colorful places in space full of constellations.
The goal is to reach the finish quickly without falling out of constellations and collect as many stars as possible.
You can use collected stars to unlock new planets.

name: Crysis Remastered Trilogy
description: The classic first person shooter from Crytek is back with the action-packed gameplay, sandbox world, and thrilling epic battles you loved the first time around – now with remastered graphics optimized for a new generation of hardware.

name: 8bit Music Power Final
description:
Your retro-console has never sounded this good before!

Featuring more than 15 original compositions by popular Japanese artists, 8-Bit Music Power Final puts chiptunes in your console, charming visualizer graphics on your TV, and the power to remix and control the experience in real-time in your hands!

name: 8Bit Music Power
description: Sin descripción

name: DreamHack Beyond
description:
Welcome to DreamHack Beyond, an at-home, all-digital free interactive experience showcasing the best of DreamHack. Players can dive into the story of the mystical Sleepers by creating their own characters, completing the game’s narrative, looking for side quests and building up their XP, farming for items like Cheer Gear, and more! Want to skip the game and get right to the booth you want? No problem!

DreamHack Beyond can be enjoyed anyway you like. With areas dedicated to game demos, cosplay, tournaments, and more, DreamHack is looking to go BEYOND the creative edge and create a one-of-a-kind online multiplayer experience. Scroll down to read more and join our community pages below for more updates.

name: Synergism
description: Free-to-win idle/incremental browser-based game.

name: Migawari Shoujo
description: Hitomi is a little girl who discovers that one of her relatives choose to make her a sacrifice to die in her place. A shinigami decides give Hitomi a chance at life. To save herself, she must discover who is the person who wanted to sacrifice her and the one who was really destined to die.

name: Doubutsu-tachi no Mori
description: You live in a house in the forest with your parents, one day walking back from collecting herbal plants you meet across a sinister crow that’s the likely case of an upcoming nightmare. The forest itself from here on out being the center stage of this scenario, where we as the protagonist must find a means to escape this nightmare.

name: Shiro no Noroi
description: Mashiro is a simple girl with typical father occupied by his work, so it ends up living in her grandmother’s house. After months of living with her ​​grandmother, Shiro (Mashiro) contacts her father asking him to visit so you can both enjoy the festival to be in place. However, the day of the festival, while waiting for her father Shiro, they begin to appear spirits. Being attacked by such spirits Shiro is saved by Hachi, who tells her that these spirits are actually “Curses” and that some of these souls stole his 7 souls. If not recovered quickly, she will die.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: BS Kure-kure Mou Race
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: BS Kure-kure Mou Race is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Shuutai Headless
description: Erina is a girl who appears in a mysterious place that seems to be an old prison. When she explores the place, she encounters the mysterious character known as the Red Witch, she warns her that place is full of evilness and prisoners who seek for revenge. Erina must find the way to escape from that place without being caught by the prisoners.

name: Gangster Simulator
description: Have you ever admired the characters from gangster movies? But not the good ones… Now you can play as a real gangster without any consequences.

name: Space Bandit
description: A rogue-lite top down shooter with crazy firefights and clever AI.

name: Blood Knot
description: Blood Knot is a 2D Side-View RPG where estranged father and daughter must work together in order to survive in the wilderness of 19th century Brazil, while they search for a treasure they hope will change their lives.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: Jewel of Live 3
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: Jewel of Live 3 is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Yummy Nuts
description: Cut the ropes, collect the nuts, have fun!

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Alf to Hakase no Daibouken
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Alf to Hakase no Daibouken is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Inferno: Beyond the 7th Circle
description: Grid-Based First Person Dungeon Crawler with survival elements. It's inspired by classic cRPG from the 90s. An old-school game for hardcore players.

name: Adorable Witch
description: This is a casual strategy game, how to avoid the devil and guide the direction of the water droplets is the key to clear the game.

name: Reforged TD
description: Reforged Tower Defense is a genre mix of tower defense and RPG where you can choose from a variety of skills, towers and units. You can decide whether you want to play a round with your friends or force the rankings.

name: Nkodice
description: NKODICE is an adaptation of a traditional Japanese dice game, which is called Chinchirorin, developed by KSYM in Japan.

name: PicoPico Pirates
description: Pico-pico Pirates is a game developed by St. Giga for the Satellaview.

name: A Sky Full of Stars Interstellar Focus
description: The FD to the events of the original Miagete Goran, Yozora Hoshi wo.

name: Fistful of Nothing
description: You are stuck in a building with no exit, Surrounded by armed gunmen and elevators that choose to not work properly. Use an empty gun and your wits to trick your way to safety to LIVE to see another day!

name: Half-Life: Dark Matter
description: An upcoming Total Conversion for Half-Life that puts you in the perspective of a Black Operations Assassin, Kovac.

name: Magicami
description: A brand-new turn-based RPG game filled with sexy magical girls! Can you unravel the mysteries? Assist the beautiful Kamisaman in stopping the raging demons and helping to get a world engulfed in chaos back to order and harmony. Every choice you make will bring you one step closer to shaping a brighter future for all.

name: Dune: Ornithopter Assault
description: First-person flight sim shooter for the GBA. The game was completed, missing a supposed multiplayer mode, But was cancelled when their publisher Cryo Interactive went bankrupt. Its rights would later be acquired by Pixel Games UK and stripped of all direct references to Dune; Renamed "Elland: The Crystal Wars".

name: Azure Sheep
description: Azure Sheep is a single player mod for Half-Life. The player is one of the Barney guards that is on post in one of the entrances of the Black Mesa facility When the chaos starts you realize that Kate, your college, code name 'Azure Sheep' is in the complex and in big dangers. You decide to rescue her...

name: Uktena
description: Hunt and topple Gargantuans to keep the enemy at bay in this atmospheric Titan-Rush Game!

name: Edge of Dead: Under a Uranium Sky
description: Edge Of Dead is an action roguelike game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Use shotguns, power saws, axes, hand grenades, cybernetic implants, and more to battle your way across the scorched landscape.

name: Wawa United
description: Wawa United is a cooperative adventure platformer with puzzle elements. Play solo or online, team up with fellow frogs, explore a gorgeous world and build the most impressive lair! Your lobby is customizable with rewards you collect during your adventures.

name: Dark Side of War
description: Dark Side of War - is a classic 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you are a single soldier fighting in the enemy rear.

name: Minion Masters: Nightmares
description:
As Mar’Dred, the Prince of Nightmares emerges from the void, he brings his demonic legions with him into our world to seed chaos...

The Nightmares Faction Box will provide you with Voidborne trickery you’ll need to lay waste to those foolish enough to oppose you. Containing +300% value of Voidborne cards, including the sneaky Mal’Shar and 2 exclusive Voidborne cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x Mal’Shar Shadowfork (Legendary!)
- 5x Demon Warrior (Supreme)
- 20x Shadow Whelp
- 50x Dragon Ball
- 50x Boomer
- 5x Power Tokens
- 1x Legendary Emote - Animated!
- 1x Supreme Avatar

Surprise your opponents with the trickery of the Voidborne. Use your invisible Shadow Whelp to sneak past enemy lines and damage the enemy Master to enable Voidborne Wound, which creates bonuses for many Voidborne cards, such as the Boomer. Or you can just toss a dragon over in your enemy’s arena with Dragon Ball. Win the game by creating an invisible army with Mal’Shar, or summon Demon Warrior enough times to have her triple in size!

name: Devil Engine: Ignition
description: Heat up Devil Engine with Ignition! Featuring 6 new stages, a new ship and an all-star Arranged soundtrack, Devil Engine Ignition nearly doubles the amount of content in Devil Engine!

name: Heli Golf
description: This is a very different kind of golf game, you can control a helicopter to play golf, instead of using the pole, and you can fly straight to the hole and drop the ball

name: Tiny Poker
description: Simple and easy to play player poker by yourself. The story mode is just like a novel game. You'll enjoy chatting with her and trying the challenges that she gives you.

name: Blacksmith Bay
description: Start the smithing shop of your dreams in Blacksmith Bay. Craft weapons to seek fortune and glory in the sleepy town of Port Pleasant. Decorate your shop to attract customers, complete commissions, and unravel the secrets of the Corbots!

name: Bunny's Maze
description: Bunny's Maze is a colorful 3D Puzzle game, navigate two little rabbits and move the walls to create a path. Go through the maze and collect all the hidden carrots. Enjoy this cute and relaxing game for all ages.

name: The Last Ones Left
description: "The LastOnesLeft" is a first-person survival horror game where the player finds themselves in an abandoned village overrun by zombies. Uncover the truth about what happened by finding mysterious letters from an unknown source.

name: Ghost Stories 2
description: This is an exciting adventure in an abandoned house in which you are left alone with ghosts and their heavy stories.

name: Blood Bowl 2: Khemri
description: Over 8,000 years ago, the Khemri played the first ever games of Blood Bowl against the Slann. However, as the kingdom died off so too did the game, that was until its rediscovery many centuries later. So with the game’s revival, it was inevitable that these ancient players would return to play again, joined by the legendary Star-Player...

name: Unity of Command II: Barbarossa
description: In this DLC, you command Axis forces during Operation Barbarossa, from their summer of roaring victories to the painful halt at the gates of Moscow in the winter of 1941/42.

name: Bragger's Run
description: A Procedurally Generated Rogue-Lite Action Game: Bragger's Run takes you on a death race across a hostile continent where you'll collect treasures and trophies from your kills. Play as the Gunslinger, the Duelist, or the Wizard and see if you have what it takes. Can you make The Run?

name: A Fox and His Robot
description: Become a fox and escape the grip of powerful Artificial Intelligences in a 2D action-platformer. A young fox and his robot search for meaning in a beautiful yet dangerous world.

name: The Last Sunshine: Rekindled
description: The Last Sunshine: Rekindled is a rogue-lite & schmup hybrid. Level up your stars, earn a variety of skills, then mix and match them with your customized stats to dispatch droves of dark aggressive enemies. Will light win against the darkness? It's the end of the universe!

name: Sol Blanka
description: This is a top down open world turn-based RPG. Eric is a young lone warrior stranded in a strange island in which is inhabited by monsters he's never seen before. Could the Dragon Legends be true, is he dead, or could he still be dreaming? Play and find out as Eric beneath the white sun, Sol Blanka!

name: Death Upon Us
description: Death Upon Us, is a game in which you will use your arsenal of guns to pull off cunning, exciting, and adrenaline pumping maneuvers to conquer levels in this game. Watch as your skills take you from killing a small horde of zombies in the School Yard to killing an abundance of zombies in the Temple.

name: Manufactoria 2022
description: Manufactoria 2022 is a constructive puzzle game about pushing robots around.

name: Artemishea
description: Step into a unforgiving world of danger and try to survive as you compete among other players to stay alive, Play as a animal and take down large prey as you progress along in your life. Hunt, Survive and Thrive in this land.

name: Vali Victorian
description: ValiVictorian is a first-person horror mystery game that explores the world between our world and where spirits reside.

name: Mystic Ruin: A New Dawn
description: Mystic Ruin: A New Dawn follows the protagonist Faust and the remainder of his crew after crash landing on a strange new world. Slay beasts, gather treasure, and most importantly learn the secrets of this strange new land throughout your adventure.

name: Power Ball 2021
description: Power Ball 2021 is here to provide block busting, ball bouncing, gun shooting action for 1 or 2 players. Inspired by great bat and ball games of the past with powerups thrown in to help you defeat the increasingly challenging levels.

name: Masquerade of Miasma
description: A bubble pop style game set during a Medieval plague, where proper sanitation, social distancing and toilet paper are key. Journey through this beautiful Medieval community, joined by other medical professionals, to save your home.

name: Far Fetched
description: Dive into the hazy and cold world of Far Fetched, where dangers lurk in the fog and only the glittering embers of the Traveling Node can keep you safe.

name: One Try Tower
description: One Try Tower is a reaction-based roguelike horror sidescroller. It's up to you to take on the challenge of descenting its many floors filled with enemies and obstacles to save yourself.

name: Welcome to Emba
description: Matthew goes to meet his beloved, who was forced to land on the old base. But there is a catch - he is on a distant planet, where during the breeding phases of the local fauna people see hallucinations.

name: Skinwalkers
description: A Horror Adventure where YOU dictate the ending.

name: Silent Woods: the Cleansed
description: A mysterious forest with strange happenings... murderous torment... alone in the silent forest? precision platformer game with puzzle elements.

name: Raccoon Arrival
description: A beautiful third-person exploration world with a raccoon, who just does his daily stuff in a post-apocalypse world, where no place for people anymore. What happened to this world?

name: Mission: In Boxes
description: Mission: In Boxes, as a spy agent, uses clever use of spy gadgets to advance through various gimmick stages. It is a puzzle escape game in VR space aiming at obtaining the target. Enjoy a new sense of VR puzzle escape game!

name: Wild world
description: This is Wild World, there is danger at every step.

name: Ice Star
description: Action shooter with story elements.

name: The Chronicler
description: Explore the enigmatic world of Isola Benedicta. Fight dangerous monsters, solve quests, and advance your skills in this fantasy open-world RPG full of charm and adventure.

name: Puzz LR
description: Become the Ultimate Puzzler! Battle against the clock or others and get the top score.

name: Red Ball Escape
description: Red ball escape is a simple puzzle platformer game with 100 Levels to complete and simple controls which ends up in simply fun!

name: Xombee
description: First Person Zombie Shooter

name: Bring Honey Home
description: Bring Honey Home is a block filling puzzle game. To complete a level you need to drag pieces to the gameboard and fill up the whole grid. It comes with 4 difficulties ranging from Beginner to Expert and there are 240 levels in total. Features : - Different diffifulties - 240 levels - Sweet art design

name: Lang Ji San Guo
description: Sin descripción

name: Protoplasm Mutiny
description: When the defense collapses, the rebels invade the base and escape has become the only choice. Take the people you care about and get out of the siege.

name: Jeff-16
description: Join the adventure of Jeff the F-16 pilot! Jeff-16 is a fun and challenging obstacle course shooter game where you attempt to fly perfectly through golden rings.You will fly across cities and mountains in an attempts to destroy the evil army who attacked your beloved city.

name: Minotaur Maze
description: Minotaur Maze is a simple action puzzle game about navigating a maze and avoiding a monster. Somewhere out there lurking, The Minotaur is honing in on your location and hunting you down! With each new level, the difficulty increases because the maze gets larger and the Minotaur gets faster.

name: Ghost College
description: An average college girl takes an elective class and everything is different. Death, spooky, enveloped her, uncovering the truth, looking for clues, making the right choice was the only way.

name: Black Smith 3
description: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Bioshock & Borderlands: The Shooter Collection
description:
A compilation that includes:

- BioShock
- Borderlands

name: Desolatium
description:
Dive into the well-known Myths of Lovecraft in a whole new way with this immersive, first-person, Point & Click, Graphic Adventure, with a taste of Survival Horror.

You will have to investigate mysterious events in order to find who is hiding behind all of the madness. But you may find something you were not looking for, since discovering what is happening will take you into a world of darkness, terror, and insanity, this is, a desolated world.

Explore a new lovecraftian adventure. Be part, like never before, of an exciting mystery based on Lovecraft’s Mythos, full of puzzles, sects, and primordial deities.

name: Freelance Trucker: Insurance Fraud Edition
description: Driving a big rig in a rigged economy has its risks, but that's why you have insurance.

name: Prison Girl
description: The girl Mei is framed to kill, become the inmate of X prison. The player plays a girl in the prison to survive and eventually try to escape the prison.

name: Fruit Clicker
description: Clicking has never been more fun with Fruit Clicker! Low on space? Bored? Then Fruit Clicker is the right game for you! Click fruit and achievements which reveal the game's backstory. Buy upgrades to become an efficient clicker. Eat fruit all day long! Play Fruit Clicker now!

name: Blurred Weird Night
description: Story mode combines the reasoning murderer to get the favor of female characters Multiple endings, multiple branches Form a interactive Supernatural story, The zombie mode killing monsters, different plots.

name: VR Time Machine Travelling in History: Visit ancient Egypt, Babylon and Greece in B.C. 400
description: The purpose of our game is to let more people know about the great civilizations of ancient Egypt and ancient Greece.

name: Mahjong Gold 2: Pirates Island
description: Let sail from Port Royal on a ship called the Golden Hind and head for Hard Luck Island. Legend has it that untold treasures are hidden there.

name: Fight
description: This is a shooting game. You can play with your friends in the local area network. Enter your name and the name of the room you want to join, enter the same room with your friends, and you can play against your friends!

name: Advanced Intelligence Surveillance Agency
description: Sir, welcome to the Advanced Surveillance Program. According to the Foreign Domain Surveillance Act signed by the Prime Minister, you will obtain the surveillance authority of KINGSBURY City. You can discover and eliminate threats by creating and deploying surveillance systems throughout the city.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Super Bomberman R Online: Premium Pack
description: This add-on pack contains 14 additional characters equipped with special types and abilities, as well as the feature to create private matches with your friends.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Dynasty Wars
description: Add Dynasty Wars to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! It's the very end of the Han Dynasty. The Yellow Turban Rebellion has thrown China into turmoil, and the warlord Dong Zhuo threatens the imperial throne itself. In the face of destruction, four men band together, ready to fight to preserve the dynasty!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Tatakai no Banka
description: Add Tatakai no Banka to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! The spirits of demonic warlords have taken over the world. You alone can stand against the forces of evil! Use your mastery of the martial arts to defeat the demonic armies!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mega Twins
description: Add Mega Twins to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Fifteen years have passed since the peaceful utopia of Alurea was destroyed by monsters. The twin sons of the king have grown into strong young men.

name: Taisho Zombi Roman (Plus)
description: This is an action game where you collect all the keys that have fallen on the stage while avoiding zombies and head to the exit. In arcade mode, you can see the reward CG according to the clear.

name: Azure
description: A final project of my college freshman year. Just jump and dash and have fun.

name: Nine Worlds
description: This is a ARPG game, at the same time contains some roguelike elements, players will freely choose to control a body, fight them in the world of monsters, in the world to find the artifact that can help you, defeat the island controller, and finally find the entrance to the next world.

name: Xtreme Typing
description: This fast-moving, action game will keep your fingers on the keyboard as you move your motorcycle across the desert and through the heart of the city. Type accurately and faster than your target words per minute and watch a motorcycle stunt fest!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tenkafubu Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around Nobunaga's grand plan to unite the land, and the historical drama that it ignited.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Nagashinonotatakai Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." Following Shingen's death, Nobunaga senses an opportunity to strike at the Takeda clan. In this age of uncertainty, heroes are made and legends are born.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Dutiful Lord of Echigo Scenario
description: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Harukage Nagao succeeded his father, Tamekage Nagao of Echigo, as leader of the Nagao clan. However, his weak nature soon had control passing to his younger brother Kagetora.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Battle of Nagashino Scenario
description: A great star falls. With the death of the head of the Takeda clan, it appeared the Takeda offensive was over. However, even without Shingen, the Takeda weren't finished. Katsuyori, the heir of the Tiger, continued to expand with the same momentum as his predecessor.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Battle of Okitanawate Scenario
description: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Following the defeat of the Otomo by the Shimazu, the Ryuzoji clan began to build up their own forces. This left the battle for Kyushu between the Shimazu and Ryuzoji clans.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit - Shokutokudoumei Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Relive the historical drama unfold towards unification in the footsteps of Nobunaga Oda and Ieyasu Tokugawa, the sworn allies from childhood.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tennouzan Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." After the Incident at Honnoji, chaos reigns once more, and heroes from across the land vie for power.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Dokuganryutatsu Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around the bold and ambitious One-Eyed Dragon, Masamune Date, and his heroic gamble to seize control of the land. This is a story of passion and unbridled ambition.

name: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers
description: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers is a yuri visual novel about love between three girls while fighting against a curse.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Mount Tennozan Scenario
description: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Who will gain control of the chaotic world that springs up after the death of Nobunaga Oda? Will it be Mitsuhide Akechi or Hideyoshi Hashiba? A battle for control of the land erupts in the vicinity of Mount Tennozan.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit - Gunshinkourinsu Scenario
description: Additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Kagetora Uesugi, later known to become Kenshin Uesugi the God of War, arrives at a battle shattered Echigo. Relive the historical drama of the ambitious expedition the young hero sets out to.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tetorigawa Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." Nobunaga Oda, in an attempt to seize control of the land, comes face to face with the honorable Kenshin Uesugi. This is the story of men who followed their ambitions to the bitter end.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Birth of Nobunaga Scenario
description: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." ▼How to use To play, select "New Game." Then, from the scenario selection screen, select "Birth of Nobunaga."

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Shingenjouraku Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." The time has finally arrived for the Takeda Army, reputedly the strongest in the land, to march upon the capital. Shingen's illness has healed, and he is no longer uncertain of what he desires.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Itsukushima Scenario
description: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around the great strategist Motonari Mori, and the time he made his move. This is the story of men who dreamed of conquest, and risked their lives.

name: Surabaya Inferno
description: Freedom or Death! Surabaya Inferno is a real-time tactics game based on the battle of Surabaya which occured at November 10th, 1945. Play as Surabayans fighting against the forces of Britain, Netherlands, and Japan in order to defend their independence in Indonesia!

name: Fish Memory
description: Fish Memory is a game with beautiful graphics and terrifying music. Puzzle, in the style of "animal", you will like it. The game develops memory well, the goal of the game is to find paired cards in the allotted time. Passing levels you will receive points.

name: Renegade: Arena Shooter
description: Renegade is a fast first person shooter inspired by many older shooters such as Doom, Aliens vs. Predator, Quake and many more!

name: Soulcaster
description: Escape an ancient temple by utilizing its arcane artifacts in an intriguing 2D puzzle plat-former.

name: Burning Mountain and Sea
description: 《烈山海》是一款以中国神话为背景的RPG游戏，玩家在游戏中将扮演一位身负奇异命运的穿越者，在机缘巧合之下来到山海境，与神农、夸父、精卫等经典神话人物相遇，一边改写他们的命运，一边完成自己的冒险……

name: Colony Antares
description: A turned-based strategy card game with light 4X mechanics about building a colony on an alien planet. Explore the world, harvest resources, construct buildings, research technologies, and fight off attacks from alien wildlife. Terraform, Assimilate, or Escape!

name: No Light
description: When wake up, you in a strange world. You must learn to be strong in this dangerous and dark world. Look for all the materials that can live, light the torch in hand, this light may be the last hope, but don't forget, in this boundless darkness, the light will also let "them" See you.

name: Stream Madness
description: An addicting clicker game that will put you in the shoes of a novice streamer! Condemn everything, gain subscribers and collect donations!

name: QB Planets
description: Get your spaceship and embark on an amazing astral adventure of engaging puzzles into the final frontier. Overcome challenges and earn rewards that will let you discover more incredible puzzle planets in the farthest reaches of outer space.

name: We Surround You
description: Your orders are to surrender, but you prefer death to dishonor. As you take on the enemy, their general will devote more resources to the fight in hopes of crushing you. He will send helicopters, tanks, planes, artillery barrages, and eventually grab his shotgun and come after you himself.

name: VR Walking Simulator
description: It is a VR Walking Simulator. Nothing more, nothing less. Explore beautiful scenes optimized for VR viewing, take pictures of the scenery, make a collage, and relax.

name: Towards the Stars
description: You are the captain of a mining ship watching your home world being destroyed by a large asteroid. Your only hope is to gather resources, create new technologies and set off on a long journey into the deep space to search of a new home.

name: Bubble Gun 3D
description: The most unique, addicting and satisfying shooting game so far!

name: Stray Kitten
description: Stray Kitten is a short 2D platformer with surviving and hardcore elements where it is described a story about one lost kitten Silver.

name: Rescue Rover Collection
description: This classic pair of whimsical and challenging grid-based action puzzle games are now available together in one package! Rescue your dog Rover from evil robots across two full games by solving fiendishly complex environmental puzzles to retrieve your beloved pup and make it safely back home.

name: Human vs Monster
description: "Human vs Monster" is a tower defense game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. You need to use humans reasonably to deal with monsters with different characteristics. There are at most five levels for each human or monster, which are-common, advanced, legend, antiquity, and creation.

name: Abstractanks
description: Abstractanks is an action-packed real-time-strategy game with an abstract theme. Play intense skirmishes with up to sixteen teams, where map-control, positioning, decision-making, speed and a little bit of luck are rewarded.

name: Algebra Ridge
description: Ready to save the world with the power of math? Find out in this unique story-driven adventure! In Algebra Ridge, you must stop Big Cheesy from stealing the Pencil of Knowledge!

name: Mech Farmer
description: A farming-combat RPG set on an alien world - with a space-western vibe. Supply the colonists with crops, help them with personal issues and defend them from hostile alien monstrosities. Full day/night seasonal cycle and fast-paced combat awaits!

name: Chasing the wind
description: Chasing the wind is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly flight forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

name: Electronic World Z
description: Electronic World Z is a 2D Challenging Platform game based on the story of a Robot called DGIN TV whose mission is to collect all of the Electronic components required to reinstate the Giant Power Generator device in "Z" Power Station.

name: Rio Warzone
description: Wotson is a novice soldier in the special services of Rio de Janeiro, he will have to show his worth facing the most dangerous bandits. Seizing drugs and money will be your goals in this game.

name: The Maze Escaper
description: What if you have the power to slow down time and become unbeatable for a certain period? Can you use your powers flawlessly and effectively against enemies to survive? The challenge is, can you ESCAPE?

name: Cub Gym
description: A challenging and fun crazy scavenger hunt game.

name: Dreamer
description: A dreamy and overcoming journey that will enchant and thrill you at each end of a complete act, embark with the Dreamer on this dream, overcome your fears and conquer.

name: Nothing to Remember
description: Nothing To Remember is an immersive murder mystery that runs in real-time, right on your desktop. Through their personal messages, you'll uncover two characters unknowingly intertwined as they hunt a killer long thought dead. When your next choice could mean life or death, will you answer the call?

name: Ghost Cash Collect
description: Join the young ghost on his epic adventure to find money!

name: Adapted Adventures: Crystal Cave
description: Follow team HARK investigating the disappearance of a team of Adapted in the neo crystal world.

name: Moonlight Blade Mobile
description: Moonlight Blade Mobile is a genuine MMORPG mobile game based on the Wuxia stories of famous novelist Gulong and authorized by the core team of PC online game.

name: WaterPolo Inter Nation
description: WIN (WaterPolo Inter Nation) is the very first multiplayer water polo video game! Like any great video game, it combines the need of great game sense, as well as mechanical skill to be able to progress.

name: Zango's Shark Adventure
description: Play an epic adventure game as Zango to help him save his family!! Four Chapters to play with 32 unique levels.

name: Tripill
description: Puzzle game with planning elements, 300 levels, many hours of fun. The game is to collect pills. You are controlling three viruses , each of them can only move in one way. You can combine them together to move in different directions.

name: The Bits That Saved the Galaxy
description: Grab up to three friends for a lo-fi, bit blasting adventure! Fight your way through unique worlds and play styles to save the galaxy!

name: Crown of the Empire
description: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Runlancer
description: Runlancer - dynamic platformer with a changing world and variability of the walkthrough. Solve the mysteries of a secret project and compete with friends!

name: The Normal Thing
description: The Normal Thing is a story about a dog who lost his memory. Sunless forests, strange gardens, weird inhabitants... Start a little journey to retrieve your memory.

name: Paradise Girls
description: Welcome to Paradise Cove, your new home. Thanks to your twin who owns the local resort you have a place to stay and even a cushy job to work whenever you please. Now you can freely explore this beach front community, meet the various women and start a fresh life, find love, or just have fun.

name: Monolight
description: MONOLIGHT is 2D plat-former puzzle adventure game. Using tiny lantern, go through the maze.

name: Monstermoerder
description: You and your team must stay alive and fight through the monsters that just seem to keep coming. All you have are your weapons and the help of your team. As you travel, you must be aware that the monsters will drive you insane.

name: Project Océara
description: Projet océara is a hardcore platform game, all stage are timed and the difficulty is croissant .

name: Wizard of Walls
description: A dungeon/maze shooter like the old arcade classic "Wizard Of Wor". It has online multiplayer for up to 4 players.

name: Contingency Creatures
description: A PvP indie pixel-art monster battler with a unique approach to turn-based combat. Choose your moves 3 turns ahead... and create a "Plan B" for if things go wrong! Will you wield your contingency plans to create ambiguous multi-layered strategies, or to fortify a brute-force offense?

name: Forest and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Na.No
description: Pilot your nanobot to defy the bloodstream, the gravity and the physics, unlock new weapons and capabilities from special hormones captured along the way. Fight the various bacteria and menacing virus with a classic gameplay mechanic and save your organism from infection.

name: Sea of Roses
description: Make choices and take control of Marion's destiny in this award-winning adventure game. Explore the peaceful and relaxing village of Seallea while making new friends and memories. Will you unravel the mysteries behind Marion's appearance in this magical new world?

name: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
description: Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world in this classic top-down single player adventure RPG. Journey through a sprawling open world and progress through dialogue options to uncover the story of Rothar Aercrest - the cursed lord to the remote lands of Imberthale.

name: Mini Words: Top Games
description: The best videogames through the decades. Test your knowledge about the games considered the best over the years in “Mini Words: Top Games”, a unique mix of logic puzzle, word search, and trivia.

name: Souls Lore
description: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Douraku. Equip souls to unlock new powers and fight the aliens in this traditional RPG.

name: 末日血战
description: Sin descripción

name: Down2Die
description: Down2Die is an advanced zombie survival game that offers many ways of replayability and customization. The game features many ways to counteract your enemies with traps and upgrades. Work together with a team up to 4 survivors and level through the waves to be at your best when the "unknown" occurs.

name: Magnace: Arena
description: Magnace: Arena is a sci-fi arena shooter where you fight the bots as heroes from the Magnace universe with their own weapons, characteristics and abilities!

name: Merge Nymphs
description: Help heal a world drowning in pollution and date a wide variety of gorgeous Nymphs in the dangerously addictive world of Merge Nymphs! Combining puzzle game mechanics with a naughty dating sim system, this game is sure to make you fall in love with its array of colorful characters!

name: Lots of guns
description: Lots of guns is a purely FPS game. It is about a story of a dark hero, who was planning to steal the power of 2nd God.

name: Punishment Darkness Online
description: An online 2D post-apocalyptic game, where you'll be in for a fantastic adventure, zombies and good friendships. With hundreds of hours of play and inspired by the style of classic RPGs.

name: Dark Room VR
description: A horror survival-based shooter game. Protect your self from the demons coming at you from all directions. Use the sound to your advantage and guns to take them down.

name: Cute Honey
description: This is a casual game. The girl in the game has different CGs and a variety of costume props. There are two different forms on the cute girl. The secret hidden on the girl is waiting for you to discover.

name: Sweet Tooth 3
description: Sweet Tooth 3 - is a physical puzzle game with a side view. In the third part, there are more new items to use and the game has become more difficult!

name: Beverage: The Last Call
description: You know the feeling when you wake up after a good ol' fender-bender, and you just have to smash and kick-ass your way through all kinds of creatures of ancient mythologies in order to rescue the gods, and to bring peace back to the earth? That's what Beverage is all about!

name: Overpower
description: Stack up your gun with unique enhancement, push through worlds of challenging foes to save a friend.

name: Naginata
description: Japanese Geisha fight against "yokai"! Can you defend kyoto against "yokai"? This is Geisha shooting action game!

name: Path to Prosperity
description: Path to Prosperity is a first-person RTS game, allowing you to control your base and people from the ground. Design and build your base, let your workers collect resources and produce goods, and raise armies to fight your competitors. Re-invest your coin wisely and send enough back home to win.

name: Level 20
description: Do you be able to reach level 20? Level 20 is a Roguelike 2D platform game with 20 randomly generated levels, where you need to defeat hordes of robots and collect energy cells to stay stronger and reach the last level.

name: Cute Dark Elves
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Wind Angel
description: "Wind Angel" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game.

name: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat
description: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat is a dark neo noir point and click adventure game where you start as a police detective Joe Kowalski and try to solve a murder that happened in Joe's neighborhood.

name: Evolution
description: Post-apocalyptic open world MMORPG Evolution. Start from single-celled organism, evolve into animal or microbe, grow a unique customized beast and dominate this world together with your friends in game universe full of puzzles and riddles!

name: Archer Master
description: A Tower Defense-Storytelling game about fighting against evil orc!

name: Commie Killer 2069
description: Your mission is to kill the communistic overlord that has taken over the United States at a forward operating base in the arctic.

name: Race to Sanity
description: Survive in the craziest places to get to your sanity. This game is racing style with physically real ragdoll. A super fun game for you to test the limits of your reflexes.

name: Instacalm VR
description: Learn meditative practice mindfulness and relaxation Instacalm VR is a suite of relaxation training and meditative practice training products

name: Animal Trainer
description: Become an animal trainer. It is a game that faithfully reproduces everything that happens in real work with various animals, domestic and exotic. You will learn how to work to get perfect results.

name: Cyber Lemur
description: Cyber Lemur is a challenging 2D couch-multiplayer game with a variety of game modes including race, jump, and battle. The controls are difficult to master, but can be made easier by having two players control the same character. The game is great for parties, or those who love a challenge.

name: Possession 1881
description: Demon sigils. Talking dolls. Delve into the dark world of Possession 1881, a point and click puzzle adventure. A game about intellect, art, and the occult in the Victorian Era. Science, history, and art all inspired numerous unique puzzles that will dare your mind to find new connections.

name: The Most Boring Game Ever
description: Clicker Simulator experiment to give you the feeling of being bored. Spacebar away and zone out.

name: The Golden Cross
description: The Golden Cross is a plot based game targeted at causal gamers who enjoy a mix of dialogue, action, adventure and puzzles. Or those players that need a break from their intense hard core games. So take a trip back to the basics and easy play. Try the free demo then decide if it's a game for you.

name: Touhou: Shooting Star
description: As a wizard "Marisa Kirisame", Fly in the Gensokyo! This is fun game of "Touhou Project"! See beautiful danmaku of touhou characters. Develop your weapon, armor, spell card to get strong. Let's play "Danmaku"!

name: Pleiades: A Subversion Saga Game
description: A sci-fi, horror, thriller, mystery and conspiracy fps.

name: All-In-One Sports VR
description: 10 Sports in 1 Game ! What type of sports acitivities will be safer during the pandemic era? All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

name: Virtual Ricochet
description: “Death-defying tennis with robots and laser guns!” Virtual Ricochet is built from the ground up as a fusion of the best of VR shooters and tennis-style mechanics in a retro-futuristic synthwave arena - IN SPACE!

name: Smelter
description: "Smelter" is a simulated game. There are nine levels of refiners in the game: Apprentice, Elementary, Intermediate, Advanced, Master, Grandmaster, Excellent, Horcrux, and Artifact. Exercise yourrefining ability and gradually become a magic refining master,who isadmired by the world.

name: Ahlman Mansion 2020
description: Ahlman Mansion 2020 is a huge collection of games made by the Game Industry students at Ahlman Institute. Some content was created by Literature, Music and Art students. All games were made during our 10 month long school. The game developments ranged from 1 week to 2 and one took 5 weeks.

name: Darkzone: Idle RPG
description: Darkzone is a multiplayer idle and incremental space fantasy adventure with a growing community. You can relax, idle, and level up, and also find deeper RPG and MMO mechanics than in your average idle game. Join Ka’ Nuun and his newly formed crime faction in an epic quest for vengeance!

name: Octarina
description: Octarina is a physics-based 3D puzzle platformer featuring a trapped little octopus who must find a way out and escape out of a sushi factory site. You play as an adorable little octopus, which is trapped inside an aquarium for its whole life. Not as a pet, but rather as a sushi ingredient. Escape your captivity and find a way out before it's too late! Use the sticky abilities of Octarina to jump, climb and cause mayhem in the factory. Discover your way to regain freedom!

name: Vagabond Starship
description: A riveting space adventure full of fantasy characters and a unicorn! Sir Typhil of Creulor and his fearless crew of elves, dwarves, aliens, and robots set out on a search across various unknown worlds, meeting zealots, rogues, reporters, and more as they seek out the ever-elusive rutabaga.

name: Monster Killer
description: Monster Killer - shooter, controlling the sight help the monster hunter, clear all the locations.

name: Xanguito Aventura
description: 2D platform adventure game

name: Unscripted
description: Choose your route. Take on your developer dream in Catalina City. Make new friends and enemies. Get your game published.

name: The Monster of Memory: Destiny
description: Winning the 8th Golden Manga Award in Taiwan, The Monster of Memory: Destiny has been adapted from the manga of the same name! Memory... Does it represent all a person has? Represented in the form of a visual novel, the ultimate in brotherly love...

name: During Before and After Covid-19
description: A weird hospital in a weird place. It has been in deep controversy since the Covid-19 take place. It was closed a few months after the virus spread, for unknown reasons. The hospital is very ancient and familiar with its inhumane experiences

name: Helicopter Simulator VR 2021: Rescue Missions
description: Learn, hone and master all the instruments and controls of a real helicopter! Follow the tutorials to turn the aircraft on and off, learn to use ropes and flares and apply your knowledge in missions based on real situations!

name: No More Surffer
description: Enter a dark 2d platform style game with choices to speak the truth and the lie it will only depend on the path you want to follow and beware of the ending you will achieve.

name: Mummmaster!
description: Protect the tomb of the pharaoh from plunderers! Craft mummies, gut corpses, collect resources, create stronger monsters every time. And most importantly, do not let the cat steal!

name: Cat's Princess
description: Visual novel, ADV, Fantasy, otome. Leah, the count's daughter, is once cursed by an evil hex. Will someone help her take it off, or will she have to take fate into her.. paws? You are waiting for magic, deadly dangers, other people's secrets, friendship, romance, and a few cute cats.

name: Minicology
description: You have crash-landed into a mini-verse of tiny planets. Welcome to Minicology! Embark on an interstellar survival sandbox journey. Use your crafting, combat, and automation skills to survive the many challenges this mini-verse throws at you.

name: Sanctuary Island
description: Dinosaur survival and role play

name: Soldier in the darkness
description: You have been sent to an island where more than four hundred visitors have turned into zombies.

name: Another FPS Game
description: Aren't you tired of always playing the same game?

name: Projections
description: A fight is like a conversation: Sometimes you listen, and sometimes you speak. And if you are prepared, when it is your turn to speak, you will know what to say.

name: Road Tripper
description: Solve mysteries, gear up, build and explore! Live the chill life of a hippy scientist.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic
description: This is the first linear chapter of a longer visual novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to chose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Gang Wars
description: Gang Wars - shoot faster, live longer!

name: Clam Man 2: Open Mic
description: OPEN MIC is the free prologue to the upcoming Clam Man 2: Headliner - a combatless stand-up comedy RPG adventure where jokes are loot and the boss fights are comedy shows!

name: Hidden Memory Nature
description: Disconnect from the world and get in touch with nature with this beautiful and relaxing minimalist puzzle!

name: Eagle Island Twist
description:
Eagle Island Twist is an expansion of Eagle Island. It adds a new story, a new protagonist and forty-five new levels.

Explore the avian world of Eagle Island with Quill and one of his loyal owls, Koji. Discover lush forests, treacherous caverns and uncover the ruins of long lost civilizations. Finally, confront the gargantuan deity, Armaura, in a desperate attempt to rescue Ichiro from her clutches.

With its falconry-based gameplay within uniquely generated worlds, Eagle Island is set to a beautifully modernized pixel art aesthetic and provides a breath of fresh air to the platforming genre.

name: Devil Inside Us: Roots of Evil
description: On this history focused horror game, you are a priest! And you need to help a family with their cursed house, explore, follow your visions, find the root, and exorcize it!

name: Cyborgs Attack
description: Cyborgs Attack is a tower defense game, where you as the player, build turrets to stop the invading cyborg forces. The turrets all have 3 upgrade phases to them and do different kinds of damage. From direct single target to splash damage. Will you be able to stop the cyborgs in time?

name: Mythos: Slavic Builder
description: Mythos Slavic Builder is a combination of classic real-time strategy games and it's based on Slavic mythology. Grow your settlement, build up the economy, army and explore maps guarded by mythical creatures & other clans.

name: Snow Wars
description: Snow Wars is a dynamic shooter that brings out your primal instinct for self-preservation. Use your skills wisely and try to hold out as long as possible. Music and beautiful visual style will accompany you throughout the game.

name: Lab Craft Survival
description: Unique survival game with interesting mechanics: reproduction, infinite character development, diseases and treatments, evolution, herbalism, farming, building, ecosystem, flexible mechanics, ever-changing and complicating environment.

name: Fractured Voyage
description: In this 2D sci-fi survival based game you must endure the difficulty of surviving on an alien planet, and need to adventure, dig and build your way to freedom.

name: Broken Universe
description: Enjoy the new and strategic casual defense incorporated into cartoon-style graphics! Set up a barrier to block enemies or create a maze to defend monsters from attacking. Every stage changes depending on how you play.

name: Galactic Solo Command
description: In Galactic Solo Command you experience the atmosphere of running a spaceship while trying to return home after the crew has mysteriously disappeared. It's a very dangerous trip, with every jump presenting a challenge with life or death decisions. Prepare your ship!

name: Super Psy Penguin
description: Super Psy Penguin is a Cyber Penguin Hero Simulator in which you play a realistic Cyber Penguin, giving you the power to save the galaxy! The game is inspired by Parodius and Xenon-II and many other Shmups from our childhoods.

name: LowPolis
description: Build, advance, reshape! For all those who have missed relaxing strategy classics. LowPolis is a friendly-paced city builder game where you become the ruler of a rising community. Begin with a handful of resources and pave your way to a truly majestic kingdom!

name: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa
description: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa is a Galgame with Cthulhu mythology, with three female (xie) masters (shen) who can be attacked, 8-10 hours of game time. Working in a coffee shop, I accidentally discovered the indescribable secret of this shop...

name: Mulligans Golf Game
description: Mulligans Golf Game is an Open Map Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when playing golf with your friends. The experience has been simplified to allow non golfers to play, but provides depth to challenge those looking for more!

name: Requiem Aeternam Eden
description: A dream-like simulation in which you impersonate Ego, the last of Lilith's children, in a mission down on Earth.

name: Boney's Research on Humans!
description: Boney is an aspiring journalist looking for the next big scoop when he gets a tip about a secret lab operation he ends up going to the biggest scoop of his undead life! Now he has to return to Monsternett and share his findings with the undead world!

name: Sea of Blood
description: The world is withering away! Someone must find the source and plug it before it is too late. As a brand new adventurer, set out on an Old-School adventure in this diverse fantasy world, and become the vanquisher of evil.

name: Johnny Mystery and the Halloween Killer
description: On Halloween night, a young detective named Johnny Mystery comes across a girl trying to escape from the police. Then, Johnny tries to unravel an intriguing murder case that happened during a party at the Municipal Music School.

name: Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand
description: Seven Dunes: Curse on the Golden Sand is a game about an operation for rescuing a princess kidnapped by monsters in a fantasy desert kingdom. The hero (user) must solve numerous puzzles and deal with countless monsters to complete the operation. It combines adventure puzzles with RPG elements.

name: Zoo Cleaner
description: This game will allow you to plunge headlong into the work of a zoo cleaner at breakneck speed. You have to clean out all the sewage of this zoo and the most important thing is not to fall into the clutches of dangerous animals!

name: Farmer Wars
description: Farm like you've never farmed before, cause this time you reap a crop of frags. This is Farmer Wars, an FPS where feuding neighbors settle the score once and for all. No such thing as the quiet country life here – choose your weapon of destruction and fight to save your property.

name: Why It's Empty Here: The Game
description: Action-survival game set in a post-apocalyptic open-world teeming with various creatures. Explore the world devastated by a mysterious virus. Search for supplies, craft weapons, and battle creatures.

name: Encounter the Light
description: 这是一个关于爱、梦想与信念的故事。 玩家需要扮演的是一位拥有进入病人梦境能力的心理医师，你将通过梦境中的只言片语与异常现象拼凑出埋藏在病人心底的桎梏，从而对症下药。 游戏将重心放在流畅细腻的叙事上，更近似于一部视觉小说。

name: The Annoying Game
description: Run, jump, die, repeat. Help Teddy on his journey through the complex, 2D dungeon, where every step will try (and usually succeed) to kill him. Are you patient enough to finish one of the most difficult games of the year?

name: Last Room
description: Last Room is a logical puzzle game in the genre of fantasy horror.

name: Farlight Commanders
description: Drive a spaceship where each player has an unique role. Play Solo or Coop with friends, up to 4. A perfect mix of space shoot em up and sci-fi action platformer. Fight in space or ground.

name: Fatal Error
description: Fatal Error is a real-time strategy game on the digital battlefields of a computer world under attack. With your TAC-AID and advanced programming, you must eliminate all threats to the Mainframe and take the fight to the viruses. Discover an abstract world of limitless potential…and lurking dangers.

name: USA Truck Simulator
description: Travel across USA as king of the roads, where you are a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! USA Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Watchman
description:
Immerse yourself in the depths of the subconscious of the main character, filled with a huge number of abstract images and traumatic memories. And find out what hides her inner world.

Watchman - Psychological horror in which you have to play for the watchman - an old, abandoned gym, where in the process of each night shift you have to face your fears and experiences, in a detailed atmosphere of a nightmare...

name: Lovengrad
