description: Become a Hunter in the terrifying Forest of Lovengrad. An unforgiving environment hides a monstrous Werewolf with different threads and mysterious creatures. Survive the Night against different Enemies and hunt the Werewolf down.

name: Struggling Ball
description: Struggling in lots of different levels which are challenging and beautiful.

name: Neon Warrior
description: The neon hero will have to make a journey full of dangers in a fantastic neon world. Solve puzzles and enjoy the graphics!

name: Supermarket Maker
description: Build and manage your very own Supermarket and make it success, with good offers and best selected products. Attract more customers with an aggressive strategy and grow to become the best Supermarket in town.

name: Chicken Ranch
description: Chicken ranch is a top down ranch simulation game where you raise all kinds of birds in a world where every single bird is a different type of chicken. Take your farmer's Nordic fate into your own hands and raise every kind of chicken, oh and don't forget to fight off the floofs!

name: Bodyless
description: Bodyless is a surreal VR experience based on the director's childhood memory during Taiwan's martial law period in the 1970s. The player becomes a deceased political prisoner's ghost in his journey to find his way home.

developers.name: Virtual and Physical Media Integration Association of Taiwan

name: Escape from Dinosaur Island
description: RPG act adventure leisure game player plays a super boy who lives in the age of science and technology. In a flight mission, he crossed the dinosaur Volcano Island 65 million years ago, After a day and night , he successfully escaped from the Dinosaur Island. This game is developed for children's love of dinosaur theme.

name: Niinamigota
description: Niinamigota is a sad, heartfelt, story rich, JRPG adventure of Island guy and his heroic quest to return home. Visit the Island and Fix the S.S. Stockhausen. Help the lost islanders and learn of the mystery snowmen! Solely built with RPG Maker 2003. Don't Forget Island Girl and Samuel!

name: Look Alive
description: It’s time to look alive and get to safety. Drive, scavenge, eat, and crush ragdoll zombies as you try to survive this vast world. Meet survivors and accept quests or make enemies and loot them all.

name: Yuri Dating Agency
description: This is a speed dating sim.

name: Roball
description: Space shooter on your own drone. Various types of weapons. Every man for himself.

name: Hazy
description: Hazy is a platform/puzzle game based in power-ups which tells the story of Tori in his journey of self-discovery while managing to save his city.

name: Gangster Empire: Vendetta
description: Ever secretly wanted to run your own Mafia organization, playing the role of a ruthless mob leader? Now you can with Gangster Empire: Vendetta!

name: Dirty Blood
description: The Blood Of The Undead Is Dirty! Play As The Specialist Soldier, And Save The World From The Undead "ZOMBIES" From Completing Your Mission!

name: Silenthead: Ducks hunt
description: Silenthead: Ducks hunt is a horror game about hunting Silenthead! You are plaing by the duck detective who need to find Silenthead and kill that beast.

name: Dizzy Two
description: This is a legendary quest from the 80s, invented by the Oliver Twins, about a yolkfolk living in trees. The main character, Dizzy, constantly rescues relatives who get into trouble. And now he found himself on a strange island after his family was kidnapped by the Hunter...

name: 100 Hidden Snails 2
description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

name: Pandemic Love
description: A short visual novel about isolation. You try to search for comfort in the lonesome people around you. Keeping the darkness at bay with small embers of light. Will you let the fear change you?

name: Zball III
description: Zball III is a new physics puzzle game. The goal is to deliver the green ball to the green platform. It sounds simple, but actually it is not. This game has puzzles about changing the direction of gravity.

name: Blimps
description: You are the captain of your own Blimp cargo company. Armed with Water, Fire, and Ice canons, and a couple of hanger Robots to help you on your way. Deliver cargo to trading posts—pirate loot from other Blimps. Can you learn to make it in this world of Blimps only to escape it?

name: Wreck the Insects
description: Wreck the Insects - An arcade-style shootem' up with a floral twist!

name: Typing Instructor for Kids Platinum 5
description: Kids learn to type on an exciting adventure on Typer Island. They learn all keyboard basics following one of 11 age-appropriate Typing Plans. Step-by-step lessons, challenges, tests, and games motivate kids to keep typing their way around the Island to reach the Castle, advance to the Lost City, and become touch-typists!

name: First Response
description: Welcome to your new job at the Extreme Containment Security Company! You've been selected by Malcolm Monaghan himself as the first subject in their brand new learning initiative! Upon your arrival, K.A.R.A. will guide you through the concepts of Cybersecurity and the important work you'll be doing!

name: Typing with Sharks
description: This action-packed, underwater adventure will help you master challenging keys on the keyboard. Type words quickly to zap hungry sharks and piranhas before they attack your submarine.

name: The Sunken Hero
description: The Sunken Hero is a game, in which one bullet and your equipment will not survive, sending you to the forefathers. Be careful and do not let yourself be intimidated by some sea monsters. Show dexterity and ingenuity. A variety of weapons, nice graphics and music for true connoisseurs of the genre.

name: Brookhaven Grimoire
description: A Wizard has trapped you in a storybook, transporting you to the magical town of Brookhaven. With spells, swords, and the power of friendship, begin your new life in this strange land. But remember, escape may yet be possible for those who unravel this world’s mysteries...

name: White Lily 2: Waking up Girl
description: This is a story-based stealth puzzle game: During the summer, Marie helped her friend Emma manage the store. One day, when a customer left the store, she accidentally left a red book. And behind this red book, there is a distant story and a huge conspiracy...

name: Planets Battle
description: Battles of space ships.

name: Paper Planet
description: Paper Planet is a planet-defender, arcade roguelike with a doodley, Flash-inspired artstyle. Battle through waves of unique enemies and bosses. Combine items with strange and wacky effects for insanely overpowered runs. Play with 1-4 players, for some chaotic co-op fun!

name: Sumotori Dreams Classic
description: Heavy headed blocky guys sumo wrestle and tumble around.

name: Fantasy Royal VR
description: "Fantasy Royal VR" is a VR strategy battle game played in a sci-fi world. Make one's mark in the world through future virtual strategic sports. Only those who can control various battlefields and unique units can become true champions.

name: Sharecare You
description: Sharecare You is an immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling anyone to explore its astonishing details in 360 degrees. Travel inside systems and organs, dissect them, visualize their natural and disease states, and even personalize the human body to be a virtual YOU!

name: Green With Energy
description: A relaxing game where you become a power engineer and iteratively design, test and build power grid designs. Balance budget, efficiency, and environmental impact, across a variety of biomes and climates. Will you build resilient systems, or cobble something together with duct tape? It's your choice.

name: Pass to Hell
description: Pass to Hell is a game where your choices lead to consequences. You will become Death and you will decide who is worthy to go to Heaven and who is to Hell.

name: DuelVox: Max Quality
description: DuelVox: Max Quality is an offline first-person shooter made in western style. In this game there are many levels with different tasks, to complete them you will need ingenuity and dexterity, and sometimes even strategy.

name: Pop up Blaster
description: Pop up Blaster is a game that allows you to shoot popups with guns, and lob grenades and dynamite at them as well. If you do not like guns, you can shoot popups with flowers instead. If you do not like the realistic sounds, you can change them as well. All of the settings can be saved.

name: Miray
description: It's a rhythm game inspired by the Reflection. The ball will bounce slope to slope, You should press any key when the ball hits the slope.

name: Obscury: The Last
description: Indie horror, where you have to go on a frightening and mystical adventure, as well as a notable fight for your own life. You will be able to plunge into the atmosphere where fear and danger prevail!

name: Cube Runner 2
description: Cube Runner 2 is a 3d action platformer that's simple to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge even the greatest gamers.

name: No Game No Life
description: "No Game No Life" is a puzzle game that erases cubes that increase and decrease according to the rules of "Conway's Game of Life".

name: Whizz Ball
description: Whizz Ball is a high speed cross between Pong, Breakout and Pinball. Play against your friends with 4 player local support, or play single player against the computer.

name: Azrael
description: AZRAEL is an indies music game with nurturing elements. Through simple and straightforward operations, anyone can enjoy the fun by playing. The game includes tracks created by artists from all over the world, as well as exquisite seal paintings drawn by illustrators. Each piece of music has produced a key tone score, which can bring players the immersive experience like playing their own music.

name: Anime Street Fight
description: Become the legendary fighters in the streets. Play single-player against many different enemies. If you are looking for a quick beat-em-up adventure, streets are waiting for you.

name: Sweets Memory
description: Sweets Memory - is a challenging memory game in which you have to find paired cards. The game is good for killing time and training your memory.

name: Norsk: Epistle
description: Norsk: Epistle is an experimental singleplayer game. Set in the atmospheric abandoned Siberian town the game will introduce how to solve puzzles using second dimension in 3d world to understand what happened with humanity.

name: Out Bike the Tsunami
description: A giant tsunami is coming!!! Help Ian bike to his safety.

name: Choco Pixel D
description: Choco Pixel D is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Anamnesis
description: Anamnesis is a roguelike card battler with a unique combo system, limit cards, elemental affinities, and strategic opportunities around every corner. With the option to keep one 'memory' after each run, get ready to customize your starter deck and experience deck building like never before.

name: The Elf's Lewd Training
description: In this game, players subject the elf queen Elfin to lewd sexual training.

name: Lazy Galaxy 2
description: Lazy Galaxy 2 is an idle/clicker game with base-building and RTS elements. Lead an evil (albeit lazy) alien race to conquer the universe! Expand your base, fight vicious foes, and conquer the galaxies. Acquire combat experience and convert into candy, the most precious alien resource!

name: Memorize Cards
description: This is a little game in the genre of paired images for memory.

name: Rubikingdom
description: Run your very own kingdom on a rubik's cube. Collect resources to develop your kingdom. Fight off raiders. Face events like famine, disease, and corruption of the land. Buy a favor from your god, pay tribute, or ignore them and feel their wrath. How long will you reign?

name: Fake Racing
description: Indie racing features on-the-fly generated challenges, fake car physics for fun casual playing and custom 1-bit 3D pixel-perfect dithering visual style.

name: BlockBustersVR
description: Overview: With simple controls and familiar mechanics, this casual fun game will get everyone in your family to enjoy it within minutes. Complete the lines by yourself or with a friend in LAN co-op mode and work towards higher points and better combos!

name: Wardroid
description: Following the steps of the "No.0 Wardroid", named Jona, and experience the escape from dangerous research facility, joining the organization against extremism, completing various tasks and finally proving herself on the battlefield.

name: Dog Fox Bunny
description: Play the game from a dog's point of view.

name: Lotharus: Bacon, Ale & Repeat
description: A humorous RPG/Adventure in full 2D, filled with quirky characters, nasty dungeons, and lots of exploration!

name: My Holiday 2
description: This is the second part of the long holiday of labor and capital! It tells the story of the protagonist's return to his hometown in the summer vacation three years after his previous work, but he is invaded by the meow man.

name: Blow it up
description: Physics sandbox game where you setup bombs, vehicles and aircrafts to destroy structures made out of voxels. Create your own worlds and blow them apart.

name: Highway Builder
description: Manage a construction company and plan, build or repair highways around the globe in a realistic simulator - Highway Builder

name: Power of Two
description: Local co-op fast-paced action game about pushing, dashing, and colliding. But there is always something more...

name: Space of Retaliation
description: Inspired by viral sensation, Among Us, Space of Retaliation is a unique sci-fi gaming experience, high quality 3D graphics and First & Third-Person viewpoints. Players aim to repair the station with the goal of escaping. However, the only chance of survival in this game is to find the disguised spy.

name: Chroma
description: Zombies, medieval combat armor, sharp and pointy weapons... what's not to love? Chroma is based in Medieval Europe with one unique twist: the continent is overrun by the undead and you've been tasked with repelling The Horde. You're not the only one on the case though.

name: Red Falcon
description: A hardcore arcade in retro soviet style. Red Falcon based on a cross between two classic retro games: Invaders and Tetris. Feel the power of soviet technology and destroy non-soviet sectarians heresy, that comes from another universe.

name: Battle Royale: For Your Heart!
description: A battle royale themed romance parody game! Select your avatar, player voice, gamertag, and possible duo partner, as you venture into an expansive virtual world alongside a colorful cast of characters.

name: Bad Boy Simulator
description: This time, mom will not be called to school! Feel like a school bully and piss off the teacher! Use different items and do stuff in the classroom. Careful - the teacher is very vigilant!

name: Pirate Island Mini Golf VR
description: Pirate Island Mini Golf VR is a single or multi-player virtual reality experience set in a scenic tropical island. There are four, 18-hole courses placed throughout the island, with multiple challenges and enhancements that can be unlocked to mix up game play to keep you coming back for more.

name: Bridge 2 Code
description: Bridge 2 Code is a bridge-building game where you can code a bridge using a simple programming language. Your goal is to create a bridge that can support a car going from the start to the end.

name: Island of Penance
description: Having doubts about her father's "accidental" death, Illumina begins to look deeper into the reports. The information leads her on a journey to become a prison guard on a notorious prison island. There she must contend with felons and corrupt officials to uncover the truth.

name: Save Christmas
description: You and Santa Claus flew to distribute gifts to children. Passing one of the forests, Santa Claus lost control and crashed into a tree, all the gifts scattered through the forest with zombies.

name: Anime: Space Sniper
description: Become the legendary assasin in the Space. Play single-player across large exotic maps. Think tactical, be quick against the time and enjoy the long distance headshots!

name: King's Orders
description: King's Orders is a simplified historical strategy game with an important innovation. You command thy armies by sending letters with orders. Messengers with letters travel the land and can be lost or intercepted. Generals execute orders once received and send you reports the same dangerous way.

name: Master of Orion: Elerian Fiefdoms
description: An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars! The psychic Elerian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.

name: Collapse
description: Challenge your building skills, record the fastest time you can finish a game, and watch out for collapses

name: Cosmic Disco
description: Feel the beat! A VR rhythm shooter where you kill enemies in beat, as they fly towards you, alternating pistols hand to hand, surrounded by beautiful skies with musical visualization. Created by a solo developer.

name: Dark Sheep
description: Dark Sheep is a block-pushing puzzle game with horror elements, and a love letter to the Commodore 64. Classic Sokoban, new twists. Throughout the game, you'll be accompanied by a soundtrack created with genuine 1989 technology.

name: Killstreak
description: Show your skills to the full on the battlefield

name: Barn Finders: Amerykan Dream
description: Take a scenic road trip through Ameryka to visit new locations full of new exciting adventures and stuff to loot

name: Insanium
description: A realtime strategy game with roguelike elements and an old school Spectrum 48k aesthetic. Can your crew overcome the killer ape rampaging aboard their starship?

name: MasterPlan
description: Masterplan is an easy-to-use task management and project planning software made for indie developers and creatives.

name: Evenorn
description: Evenorn is an atmospheric fast-paced 2D Jump & Run with precise mechanics and controls. Our intention is to challenge the player, without being unfair.

name: Jetpack Jack
description: Jetpack platformer. Fly around, avoid obstacles, collect dog biscuits to feed your hungry dogs!

name: Poco In Dungeon
description: ​Let's get Poco-chan out of the fortress! ​This game is a TPS game. ​Use the actions of shooting, flying, swimming, and catch & down to get Poco-chan out of the fortress of the fantasy world.

name: OGgolf
description: Golf a full 18 hole course, over canyons, across small islands, on a mountain, at the beach, in a swamp and more!!!! 2d open world golf island with wind, sand, water hazards, rough, fairway, green & out of bounds areas.

name: Dark Existence
description: Dark Existence is an upcoming multiplayer atmospheric horror game. You will be able to walk the halls of horror alongside your friends and share the horrifying experience together.

name: Dig Deep: Race to the Core!
description: It's about to go down! All the way down! Challenge your friends and see who'll come out on top as you race to the centre of the Earth through a series of chaotic puzzles and challenges!

name: Across Killzone
description: Nacro9 game studio My first effort Offer

name: At Your Feet
description: In this yuri dating sim, take on the role of Emma, a twenty year old college student of Mexican origin who has a secret: she has a foot fetish.

name: Yurikago
description: This is a game where you can escape if you do something "Yuri."

name: BasCatball Mars: Basketball & Cat
description: Play basketball. In Mars. With cats. Are you ready for the whole galaxy's hardest matches? Solve puzzles and win the Bascatball intergalactic championship!

name: Traffic Command
description: Traffic Command - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go.One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: Arcus
description: Arcus is a fantasy action game where failure is just the next step in the story. Use a bow to aim and fire arrows at invading enemies. Swing your sword at any angle to get past enemy defenses. Spend resources between missions to buy special arrow types and increase your chances of success while you solve the mystery behind the new undead skeleton faction in a land where magic has been made taboo.

name: Night Tail
description: There are monsters in the world that devours human memory and spirit, called dream monster. The protagonist, Yoru, has the power to fight against the dream monsters to dispel people's nightmares. To save everyone, Yoru decided to challenge "Paradise Manager", the manipulator of the dream monsters.

name: Punchout: Music
description:
Get into the rhythm, take fighting pose! Punchout: Music is a rhythmic boxercise game.
Enjoy tons of handcrafted levels and punchout the music, in the futuristic stadium.
Punch the incoming notes with your energy-gloves - you must match the color of glove and note, and its flying direction. With this game, you become a champion of the rhythmical boxing!

name: Lands of Raynar
description: Take on the role of Karia and unveil the hidden truth of the past with your mysterious companion Ivy. Explore the Lands of Raynar as you take on enemies as they lead through Mórrí, a mythical creature of unknown origin.

name: Syberia 3: An Automaton with a Plan
description: Discover "An Automaton with a Plan", a new adventure that takes place in the enchanted world of Syberia 3! Play as Oscar, the famous automat, and unravel the mystery of Kate Walker's disappearance!

name: Istoria
description: Istoria is a Story driven Turn-based Strategy Game. Follow Nemus Story, Customize your Characters and complete challenges.

name: Anno 1800: Sunken Treasures
description:
The 1st DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 1 Pass.

Go treasure hunting in the depths of the Sea and build your biggest city yet on a huge new continental island in Sunken Treasures, the first DLC for Anno 1800.

name: Thyra Adventure
description: Thyra Adventure is a game based on medieval history. Become a warrior and save the middle earth from Zarod's hands, going through traps, facing warriors and magicians along the way.

name: RetroShooti
description: RetroShooti is a totally ridiculous shoot 'em up fantasy game. Fight through more than 30 levels on this crazy galactic trip and face the wackiest bosses and foes! Or battle with friends in local Co-op and vs. game modes!

name: Seishin Destiny
description: A powerful Oni and his army invaded the earth, cursing all mankind to roam the land without rest. Years later the spirits found a way to take possession of bodies through masks to finally face the demons and get rid of this curse.

name: Rush Out of the Room
description: This is a casual puzzle game. Games are pixelated. You need to pave the way by placing items on the left side and avoiding obstacles to reach your final destination. Please use your talents to overcome the obstacles.

name: One Circle
description: One Circle is a minimalist puzzle game about putting balls of the same color together. Find the right moves to solve the proposed challenges, and challenge your mind more and more.

name: GrandMa Badass
description:
Grandma Badass is a 2D cartoon point and click adventure game.

This point and click video game immerses you in the shoes of GrandMa, an old woman who will work to find her black cat Marius, missing and probably kidnapped.

name: Temple Hunters
description: Temple Hunters is an adventurous treasure hunting game where 2 teams compete against each other to claim the most treasure! You play as either the USA or the Germans in the mid-1930s. You'll raid tombs, encounter traps, fight players on your quest of finding lost treasure and artefacts.

name: Troll Hunter VR
description: In Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Hunt for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

name: Bibou Quest
description: Lead this platform game in 2 players or 1 player, if you prefer, using only one controller if you don't have another. And go in search of rescuing Bibou and Udi's grandfather, who was kidnapped.

name: Bunny Count
description: Capture The Flag , Team Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed are included as online and offline game modes! Its the Bunnies VS The Bears !

name: Juno's Journey
description: Bark at your enemies! Rescue your friends! Spring into action! Will you find all the locked up puppies on Doggo Island? Journey like no dog before and become a husky hero!

name: Waverly Hills
description: A real-time exploration horror game. You will explore an abandoned hospital in the game and search for key items to escape from birth. Please beware of those fears from darkness and unknown.

name: Naera: It's Time to Retry
description: Naera: It's Time to Retry is a solo first person puzzle game, created by one-man development studio SHK Interactive using Unreal Engine. Each room is limited in time, use your power to slowdown the environnement and complete the test chamber.

name: Isometric World: Frame of Mind
description: In this game, you play as 15-year-old Cole Andrews on a journey through a Virtual Isometric 3D world. Using perspective and rotation, you have to make your way through the world to reach the emergency exit at the end. Just remember, everything is not what it seems...

name: Night Wanderings
description: "Night Wanderings" is a classic 2D arcade shooter game with tons of enemies and settlements you need to defend!

name: Astro Sentai Jarbonder
description: It's a bullet-hell spaceship shooter. Can you survive the battlefield? Let's prove your shooting skills!

name: Wars Across the World: Bosworth 1485
description: Bosworth 1485 simulates the last battles of the War of the Roses in England, between the York and Lancaster families. Henry Tudor's objective is to land from France to claim the throne occupied by Richard III of York.

name: Lichenvale
description: Inspired by 90's hits like Hexen and Quake, Lichenvale is a first person hack and slash offering fast-paced melee action mixed with the tactical use of spells and dashing around your enemies.

name: Just Old
description: Just Old-a platformer that will allow you to play as a nimble old man, in which the body of a very young man is enclosed. Go around all the obstacles, destroying monsters. Feature of game: - Hardcore - Nice Pixel Art - Boss

name: Alas Astra
description: Among distant stars a lone Robot Knight must stand against an ancient and unfathomable evil. Explore the vast and alien Degathalion space station and battle the nefarious Xetanoids in a daring quest to confront their rulers and save the Centaurus galaxy.

name: Pink Island
description: Pink Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Clash II
description: Clash II is a turn-based strategy game, where player will get the chance to immerse himself as a commander of one of quareled fractions.

name: Zero-G Gunfight
description: A 2D arena shooter set in outer space where you use your guns to move and kill each other! Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nations one set closer to intergalactic supremacy!

name: Kosta Projekt
description: A virus that attacks a handful of survivors and you who with the rest of hope will have to survive and maybe even save the world so you'd better find an antidote. The action takes place in the future in a post-apocalyptic world in one of the districts of Katowice - Kostuchna

name: Neonverse Defenders
description: Neonverse defenders: The retro-futuristic 3D Tower Defense game.

name: Nino Maze Lofi
description: First maze game that combines lo-fi songs and cute graphics.

name: The Line
description: Reinventing of 3D puzzles. Experimental gameplay you've never seen before.

name: Pokon Factory Survival
description: Pokon Factory Survival is a 3D infinite world game. Mining resources, creating materials for spaceships, and escaping.

name: Prison 69
description: Prsion 69 : third-person Box fighting

name: The Great Art Heist
description: You play as Jack a kid who loves art ever since he could remember. His parents took him to many museums when he was younger, ever since he has wanted to collect art pieces. Take on contracts or collect for yourself.

name: Chick Invasion
description: Chickens. They've made a deal with the aliens. Humanity has but one hope, Jimmy Gunson, a train, and he just wants to get home.

name: Underworld Memories
description: Each death is a new life experience! Underworld Memories is an Action Roguelike with changeable maps. Explore the Underworld in this 2D adventure without checkpoints. Learn from your mistakes and try again, again and again.

name: Bitchy Boss Bimbofication
description: If working the 9-to-5 grind wasn't soul crushing enough, having a bitchy boss constantly yelling at you sure is! That all changes for our protagonist, who works up the courage to test out a sketchy Hypnosis app on who else, but his sexy boss!

name: Contrast Tunnel
description: Contrast Tunnel is a first-person runner-style arcade game.

name: Faircroft's Antiques: Home for Christmas
description: Mia Faircroft is Home for Christmas! Explore her hometown in this wonderful Hidden Object game, perfect for the season. Search through detailed locations, fix up worn antiques, and save the holidays for the community of Mikamaw Point!

name: Galactic Speed Legends
description: Buy a craft or build a new one from the scratch, bet it, repair it, upgrade it, push it to the limit and take high-speed turns like never before. Prepare yourself to challenge elite drivers in the galaxy through a series of championships, and personal head to head races.

name: Friendly Arena
description: If you ever wanted a chaotic multiplayer game, Friendly Arena is all about that, it's a casual, physics based and multiplayer game with up to 20 players and set in fun/chaotic minigames

name: Many Bricks Breaker
description:
Many Bricks Breaker is a Brick Breaker game.
You need to break many bricks.

name: Project Blari
description: Try to survive in this semi open horror game inspired by the ps1 graphic era.

name: Crash Dive 2
description: WWII Tactical submarine combat in the South Pacific

name: Street Hero
description: A crazy fun fast-paced explosive open-world superhero game made by one person. Play as a powerful superhero with ultimate combat skills, speed, and strength.

name: Kill Demons
description: A classic round RPG role-playing game. Key control role movement, enter or space bar to pick up items, dialogue NPC.

name: Pop-It! Or Don't..
description: Pop-It! Or Don't.. Is an addictive, fast paced, physics based, balloon popping click-fest! Keep popping balloons until the timer runs out to advance to the next round. Can you pop them all?

name: Paradise Away
description: Manage a group of survivals in this base building game set in a tropical island! Will you be able to escape from the island?

name: Arosia
description: Arosia is the Tile Map game based on Strategy and Luck. Use your strategy skills with best of luck to occupy World! Don't stop untill the World is yours.

name: VHAIP
description: Vhaip is a scary survival game in VR. Survive to raptors in co-op or solo up to 4 players. Survive or kill are the only way ! Will you survive ?

name: Formula Bit Racing
description: Formula Bit Racing is a fun arcade racing game that’s influenced by the classic arcade racing games of the early 90’s. Each curve and each lap in Formula Bit Racing recreates classic arcade gameplay and offers you unbound speed limits of fun. Full throttle on and enjoy!

name: Paths & Danger
description:
Paths & Danger is a procedural turn-based RPG with a dark twist. Join in on an adventure where you must gather a balanced group of heroes to embark on a series of quests and uncover the great mystery surrounding the province of Westwall.

To complete each quest, you must travel many paths in which you have to deal with random encounters and different situations and make the best of it.
Upon completing many quests, you must hire and recruit new members for your party, each with different skills. You can also increase the success of your adventures by improving your character's gear and equipment. Plus, pack up all sorts of potions, loot precious gems and gold to help you along the journey.

name: Infected Town
description: You are a special purpose soldier and your goal is to destroy some settlement, which is inhabited by a bunch of sorcerers.

name: No Man is an Island
description: Zombie virus swept the world, the infected people were isolated to some closed islands. Some organizations hold zombie hunting competitions. In a hunting, you're infected with the virus and abandoned on an island. The hunt is not over and you've gone from hunter to prey.

name: HTD
description: HTD is a mix of classic party-based RPG and fast-paced real-time action. Control a party consisting of healer, tank and damage dealer, each immensely powerful in their specific role, and use their strengths to take down horrific enemies while journeying through a dark story of mystery and madness.

name: Pangman
description: Pangman takes you inside a VR classic arcade game experience, where your goal is to burst spheres by using a pair of guns that transform into hooks when you throw them. Complete 140 story mode levels in individual or cooperative campaign, and enjoy frantic multiplayer games with up to 8 players.

name: Keep Wall
description: Blocked bullets of tanks by blocks of trucks, keep wall with a full of blocks

name: Anno 1800: Botanica
description:
The 2nd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 1 Pass.

Continue your adventure in the award-winning Anno 1800 with new Botanica DLC.

name: Napoleon Maiden
description: "Napoleon Maiden" Live2D Visual Novel. Shoichi Sakikawa was a normal, second-year high school student.Or, he was, until he woke up from a car accident only to find himself trapped in mid-revolution 19th century France.

name: The Curse of Mantras
description: Play as Lily or Ace and with the help of 10 different avatars (each one a potential love interest) remember their past and discover if you can escape the Afterlife. With optional card battle gameplay.

name: Android
description: Android is a 2D platformer very similar to Brøderbund’s classic Lode Runner.

name: SmFly: Gravity Adventure
description: Platformer with physics and gravity toggle.

name: Manipulate: Sacrifice
description: Are you ready for a fearful journey beyond your perceptions?

name: Holostar Command: Quantum Alliance
description: Holostar Command is a fast-paced shooter game that brings Classic Mid-20th Century Space Arcade Games into the 21st Century and right into your living room! Today's tech, Virtual, Mixed & Augmented Realities, with a little nostalgia tossed in to honor the games we loved from days gone by...

name: KabochaFarm
description: This is a casual game that takes 5 minutes per game. It's a simple job of sorting vegetables flowing over the conveyor! Watch the jack-o-lanterns get into an off-the-field brawl outside of Halloween that you didn't expect!

name: Deadly Forest
description: Horror adventure game where you need to explore and discover the mistery of the area

name: The Lost and The Wicked
description: The Lost and The Wicked is a Brutal Twin-Stick Psycho-Thriller. You wake up surrounded by strange creatures, confused with no memory. Explore the world, defeating monsters and bosses along the way to uncover more about this place, who you are, and how you got here. Are you lost or are you wicked?

name: Cyberpulse
description: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

name: Too Different
description: Unravel the mysterious past of your parents and homeland while journeying through four unique lands in this exciting science-fantasy adventure!

name: Assimilation X
description: Embody the simulation of a dead mysterious man as he is revived as part of Project Engram. Descend down the various levels of the increasingly mind-bending twisted simulation in order to destroy this electronic universe and end the suffering of millions. The Ultimate Platformer!

name: Command & Control 3
description: Assume the role of a special forces commander, fighting against a terrorist organization named "Dawn of Freedom".

name: Toast Defense
description: Ducks are after your toast! Setup various water guns in this fun tower defense game to shoo away the ducks so they don't steal your precious toast. You choose how many flocks of ducks come for your toast each wave, the greater the risk the greater the reward!

name: Finding Fido: The Journey
description: Join the quest to find your dog! Featuring fun environments to explore, strange characters, and riddle to solve.

name: Super Woden GP
description: Feel the excitement of the 90s with the isometric perspective, its huge number of vehicles and its brilliant soundtrack. More than 60 cars from six manufacturers from different countries to buy, an extensive campaign mode, dozens of circuits, rally stages, championships, and much more awaits you!

name: Dual Guns Fantasy
description: "Dual Guns Fanstasy" is a simple and short shooting game with a arcade game style, it has a time-crisis style weapon system, the special effect of the body being hit by a bullet, and enemies from the fantasy world.

name: Brutality club
description: This is a one-on-one fighting simulator.

name: Proto Cuckoo 64
description: Save the Eggs in this 8-bit Inspired Arcade Puzzler!

name: Ninja Scarf
description: It's okay to cry--as long as you save the day, right? Join Cry, a young ninja, as he overcomes his shy nature to stand against a powerful threat. Journey through each exciting area, master four unique weapons and, most importantly, make your dear father proud in this 2D action platformer!

name: Mutated Muter's Invasion
description: A fun platformer adventure game about a music note fighting mobs and collecting power-ups and other items (with a couple side-scrolling shooter levels). Neutralize the evil Mutated Muter, a magical monster from the outer space who wants to steal all the music from the world!

name: Nature Park
description: Adventure Games

name: Block Destruction
description: Want some destructions? Have fun destroying this cubic world. Different maps and weapons for you to have fun with. Slow down time, pause time to enjoy it more. Editor is available for you to play around!

name: Starsation
description: Starsation is a space shooter game made in voxel graphics.

name: 50 Level Survival
description: 50 Level survival is a point and click survival game. The goal is to complete the 50 levels. Can you complete the 50 levels?

name: Gate to Site 8
description: Gate to Site 8 is a short, dark story-driven game about the traumatic childhood of two brothers. You venture back home and try to remember the fragmented memories of your past.

name: Pan-Arcade Airlines
description: Calling all flight enthusiasts! Arcade style flight simulator based on real physics. Fly airplanes through the history of civil aviation. Buy new aircraft, upgrade your fleet, establish new routes and try to keep your passengers happy.

name: Warriors Heaven
description: Warriors Heaven is a turn based RPG with an arcade style game flow. Select your characters, buy their items, customize their weapons, and win as many battles as possible to get a high score. Various game modes and a deep, dynamic combat system allows for a well of player expression and replay value.
